address: Xã Hải Trung, Huyện Hải Hậu, Tỉnh Nam Định
thought:
**Mapping an Old Vietnamese Address to New Administrative Units**

Okay, so I've got this old Vietnamese address to decipher: Xã Hải Trung, Huyện Hải Hậu, Tỉnh Nam Định.  The user wants the equivalent in the new system, factoring in recent administrative changes, specifically eliminating all districts.  Sounds like a fun challenge!

First, I break down the address into its components.  We have the old "Xã Hải Trung" ward, the "Huyện Hải Hậu" district, and the "Tỉnh Nam Định" province.  The "eliminating all districts" bit is the key here.  I know that means we're likely looking at wards being absorbed into larger units or new ward structures.

I immediately check the Province Resolutions (60-NQ/TW).  Nam Định isn't listed as unchanged, and sure enough, it's merged into Ninh Bình. So, Tỉnh Nam Định is now part of Tỉnh Ninh Bình. That gives me my new province.

Next, I dig into the other resolutions, zeroing in on "Xã Hải Trung."  Bingo! Resolution 1674/NQ-UBTVQH15, focused on Ninh Bình, directly states that "Xã Hải Trung" *and* others will be merged into a new ward: "Xã Hải Hậu".  Perfect. The province matches, and the ward change is explicit.

I then cross-reference with the new ward data.  And there it is: "Xã Hải Hậu" exists in Tỉnh Ninh Bình with code "14215".  All the pieces fit.  I have my new province, my new ward, and the code associated with the new ward.

Since the old district is dissolved per the instructions, the ward-level reorganization directly addresses that, making the district component moot.

I'll build the JSON output with a high confidence level because the resolution specifically addresses "Xã Hải Trung", and all the data is consistent. The citation will include the relevant parts of resolution 1674/NQ-UBTVQH15. No other resolutions or ward information conflict, so the mapping is straightforward. I'm satisfied this is the most accurate translation.

citation.header: 1674/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Ninh Bình
citation.line: 45. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Yên Định, xã Hải Trung và xã Hải Long thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Hải Hậu.
